Windows:
just click twice on the program.
ENG ---- English version
DEU ---- German version
ESP ---- Spanish version

Linux: 
Open a terminal in the directory you're in (/AgeCalculator/dist)
write one of the next comands:
java -jar ageCalculator_DEU.jar ------- German version
java -jar AgeCalculator_ENG.jar ------- English version
java -jar AgeCalculator_ESP.jar ------- Spanish version
